content.rendered:
As of June 26, 2015 Gross Management is a company 100% controlled by board member Glen Ole Rødland.

Glen Ole Rødland and Associated companies hold 5367 996 shares in Aqualis ASA Corresponding two 12.43% of the outstanding shares.
